sentences.english: The bright colours on the wall caught our attention.
sentences.chinese: 墙壁上鲜艳的颜色吸引了我们的注意力。

sentences.english: In the fall, the leaves of both types turn a brilliant red.
sentences.chinese: 在秋天这两种叶子会变成鲜艳的红色。

sentences.english: The children love to collect the colorful Hsiang Bao.
sentences.chinese: 小孩喜欢搜集鲜艳的香包。

sentences.english: To celebrate, he had the cowling and struts of his fighter painted bright blue.
sentences.chinese: 庆祝，他有整流罩和他的战士的高视阔步画鲜艳蓝色。

sentences.english: Things didn't say, embroider line, color is not bright bright.
sentences.chinese: 东西没得说，绣线光亮不起球，颜色十分鲜艳。

sentences.english: Or you can go for an eclectic look with a shiny metal or painted cart.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以别具一格，选择带金属光泽或色彩鲜艳的。

sentences.english: Deep cherry red colour with light brick edges.
sentences.chinese: 鲜艳的深樱桃红色带红边，色泽清晰。

sentences.english: She painted the window sills a bright colour.
sentences.chinese: 她把窗台漆上鲜艳的颜色。

sentences.english: A hundred bright yellow flowers grow.
sentences.chinese: 现在盛开着鲜艳夺目的一片小黄花。

sentences.english: The red badge on the white hat looks very nice and bright.
sentences.chinese: 帽子上的这朵红色的帽花，看着非常鲜艳漂亮。

sentences.english: Her hair was coloured with a defiant streak of red.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发上染了几条鲜艳的红色。

sentences.english: His clothes are bright in colour.
A young men and women and rejoice, bundles bright-coloured rose itch to try.
sentences.chinese: 一个个年轻男女欢欣鼓舞，一束束鲜艳玫瑰跃跃欲试。

sentences.english: Without embarrassment, I covered his coffin with the largest, reddest roses I could find.
sentences.chinese: 没有窘迫，我用很多鲜艳的红玫瑰铺在棺材上。

sentences.english: Our loves are like flower similar and fresh and gorgeous brilliant.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱像花儿一样鲜艳夺目。

sentences.english: Children in bright-coloured dresses are playing in the park.
sentences.chinese: 穿着鲜艳服装的孩子们正在公园里玩耍。

definition: tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]
